name: rich.inspect
signature: rich.inspect(obj: Any, *, console: Optional[ForwardRef('Console')] = None, title: Optional[str] = None, help: bool = False, methods: bool = False, docs: bool = True, private: bool = False, dunder: bool = False, sort: bool = True, all: bool = False, value: bool = True) -> None
desc:
* inspect(<OBJECT>) to see summarized info.
* inspect(<OBJECT>, methods=True) to see methods.
* inspect(<OBJECT>, help=True) to see full (non-abbreviated) help.
* inspect(<OBJECT>, private=True) to see private attributes (single underscore).
* inspect(<OBJECT>, dunder=True) to see attributes beginning with double underscore.
* inspect(<OBJECT>, all=True) to see all attributes.

args.name: title
args.desc: Title to display over inspect result, or None use type. Defaults to None.

args.name: help
args.desc: Show full help text rather than just first paragraph. Defaults to False.

args.name: methods
args.desc: Enable inspection of callables. Defaults to False.

args.name: docs
args.desc: Also render doc strings. Defaults to True.

args.name: private
args.desc: Show private attributes (beginning with underscore). Defaults to False.

args.name: dunder
args.desc: Show attributes starting with double underscore. Defaults to False.

args.name: sort
args.desc: Sort attributes alphabetically. Defaults to True.

args.name: all
args.desc: Show all attributes. Defaults to False.

args.name: value
args.desc: Pretty print value. Defaults to True.
